findings.title: Owner can change the tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the tax and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner exclude from and include in restricting max transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude or include certain addresses in restricting maximum transaction amounts, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can activate contract (enables below preset)
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to activate the contract which enables certain presets.

findings.title: Owner can change reward cycle block
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the reward cycle block, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable reflection fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable the reflection fee.

findings.title: Owner can change thresh hold top up rate
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the threshold top-up rate, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change charity address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the charity address, which may lead to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw tokens from contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw BNBs from contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw BNBs from the contract without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
